none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on October 25, 2013 Description from Terminal Escape:
This just kills. Hollow, desperate punk from Los Angeles steeped in primitive Japanese hardcore with an all knowing eye. A blazing eye. Get it? They do. BLAZING EYE Conquest For Death and FlipoutA.A are playing Los Angeles tonight at the 7th St. warehouse with Crimson Scarlet and a shit ton of halloween covers bands, If you live there then you should watch it, because at some point in the evening, things are likely to get pretty fukkn wild. I might get a tattoo.
//1.bp.blogspot.com/-lIx0Amv3c7I/UmofyjkrfZI/AAAAAAAAI3U/I5CmTXPRS14/s1600/blazing+eye+cover+copy.jpg

seo.title: Blazing Eye - Blazing Eye demo 2013 - Terminal Escape
